full_summary:
**Contract Title**: St. Marys River Navigational Dredging
=============================================

**Contract ID**: WS4284601007
------------------------

**Publication Date**: November 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: November 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
------------------------------------------

**Scope of Work**:
The contractor shall perform maintenance dredging to re-establish navigational water depths of the St. Marys River, and dispose of the dredged material. The work must be completed within 7 (seven) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**
---------------------

* **Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario**

**Bid Submissions**
-----------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on November 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.

**Contracting Entity Contact**
---------------------------

* **Name**: Sheila Dhanna
* **Email**: [sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
-------------

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17887979?extsite=MTc4ODc5NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
